defaultNonprofits.name: Green Team
defaultNonprofits.mission: Our goal is to ensure campuses stay clean and trash free.

defaultNonprofits.name: Community Food Pantry
defaultNonprofits.mission: To provide food assistance to families in need

defaultNonprofits.name: Paws and Whiskers Rescue
defaultNonprofits.mission: To find loving homes for homeless animals

defaultNonprofits.name: Big Brothers Big Sisters
defaultNonprofits.mission: To empower youth through mentorship and guidance

defaultNonprofits.name: Ocean Guardians
defaultNonprofits.mission: To protect marine ecosystems and promote sustainable ocean practices

defaultNonprofits.name: Homeward Bound
defaultNonprofits.mission: Provide housing, support services, and advocacy to individuals and families experiencing homelessness.

defaultNonprofits.name: Community Caregivers
defaultNonprofits.mission: To assist seniors with daily living activities and provide companionship

defaultActivity.name: Beach Cleanup at Waikiki
defaultActivity.details: Join us for a morning of community service cleaning Waikiki Beach. Supplies provided.
defaultActivity.benefits: Contribute to a cleaner environment, meet community members.
defaultActivity.requirement: Please wear sun protection and bring water.

defaultActivity.name: Kailua Beach Park Restoration
defaultActivity.details: Help restore native plants and remove invasive species at Kailua Beach Park.
defaultActivity.benefits: Restore natural habitats, learn about local flora.

defaultActivity.name: Food Distribution at Haleiwa
defaultActivity.details: Distribute food and supplies to families in need in the Haleiwa community.
defaultActivity.requirement: Health and safety training provided on-site.

defaultActivity.name: Manoa Valley Tree Planting
defaultActivity.details: Join our effort to reforest parts of Manoa Valley. All tools and guidance provided.
defaultActivity.benefits: Combat climate change, beautify the valley.
defaultActivity.requirement: Wear appropriate clothing and footwear for muddy conditions.

defaultActivity.name: After School Tutoring in Waianae
defaultActivity.details: Provide tutoring and homework help to students in Waianae. Subjects vary.
defaultActivity.benefits: Help students succeed academically, mentorship experience.
defaultActivity.requirement: Background check and education in relevant subjects.

defaultActivity.name: Historic Preservation at Iolani Palace
defaultActivity.details: Assist in preserving and maintaining the historic Iolani Palace and its grounds.
defaultActivity.benefits: Learn about Hawaiian history, contribute to preservation.
defaultActivity.requirement: Respect for cultural heritage, attention to detail.

defaultActivity.name: Conservation Work at Waimea Valley
defaultActivity.details: Engage in various conservation activities to protect the ecosystems of Waimea Valley.
defaultActivity.requirement: Ability to perform physical tasks outdoors.

defaultActivity.name: Senior Companion Program in Mililani
defaultActivity.details: Spend time with seniors, assist with errands, and provide companionship.
defaultActivity.benefits: Improve the well-being of elderly, gain valuable social experience.
defaultActivity.requirement: Compassion, patience, and good communication skills.

defaultActivity.name: Sunrise Shell Beach Cleanup
defaultActivity.details: Help clean up one of Oahu's beautiful beaches early in the morning.
defaultActivity.requirement: Bring gloves and wear sturdy shoes.

defaultActivity.name: Urban Gardening in Downtown Honolulu
defaultActivity.details: Join our urban gardening project and help grow food for local homeless shelters.
defaultActivity.benefits: Learn about sustainable gardening, support the community.

defaultCalendarEvents.title: Community Meetup
defaultCalendarEvents.description: A local community gathering to discuss upcoming projects and initiatives.

defaultCalendarEvents.title: Health and Wellness Fair
defaultCalendarEvents.description: Annual fair featuring health screenings, wellness talks, and fitness demonstrations.

defaultCalendarEvents.title: Technology Workshop: Emerging Trends
defaultCalendarEvents.description: Explore the latest trends in technology and their impact on our society.

defaultCalendarEvents.title: Local Farmers' Market
defaultCalendarEvents.description: Support local farmers and artisans at the weekly farmers' market.

defaultCalendarEvents.title: Eco-Conscious Living Workshop
defaultCalendarEvents.description: Learn practical tips for living a more eco-friendly lifestyle.

defaultCalendarEvents.title: Art in the Park
defaultCalendarEvents.description: An outdoor exhibition showcasing local artists and their work.

defaultCalendarEvents.title: Coding Bootcamp for Beginners
defaultCalendarEvents.description: A comprehensive introduction to coding for absolute beginners.

defaultCalendarEvents.title: Sustainability and Business Conference
defaultCalendarEvents.description: A conference on integrating sustainability practices within businesses.

defaultCalendarEvents.title: Community Yoga Day
defaultCalendarEvents.description: A day dedicated to wellness and yoga with multiple sessions throughout the day.

defaultCalendarEvents.title: New Year's Eve Celebration
defaultCalendarEvents.description: Ring in the new year with the community. Fireworks, music, and festivities.

defaultOrganizations.name: Eco Warriors
defaultOrganizations.missionStatement: To combat climate change through education, activism, and community-led initiatives.
defaultOrganizations.description: Focused on environmental sustainability, our goal is to create a greener, cleaner world for future generations.

defaultOrganizations.name: Global Literacy Project
defaultOrganizations.missionStatement: To eradicate illiteracy across the globe by providing access to quality education for all.
defaultOrganizations.description: Empowering communities through education, we aim to unlock the potential in every individual.

defaultOrganizations.name: HealthBridge
defaultOrganizations.missionStatement: Connecting underserved communities with essential healthcare services.
defaultOrganizations.description: Our mission is to bridge the gap in healthcare accessibility, ensuring everyone receives the care they need.

defaultOrganizations.name: Code for Everyone
defaultOrganizations.missionStatement: Democratizing technology education by making coding accessible to all.
defaultOrganizations.description: We believe in the power of technology to transform lives and are committed to teaching coding skills to those who need them most.

defaultOrganizations.name: Green Future Foundation
defaultOrganizations.missionStatement: Promoting sustainable living and renewable energy to secure a greener future for all.
defaultOrganizations.description: Through advocacy, education, and innovation, we aim to inspire action towards a sustainable world.
